Description: * {{PageRef|Decay}} Decay: Cast range reduced from 30m to 15m
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip: No longer has +1 Stamina
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip: Duration reduced from 3.5s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}} Withering Whip: Bullet Resist Reduction reduced from -20% to -14%
